title: Science Concept Structuring Learning Design Using Graphic Organizers

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic scientific terminology and ability to connect simple concepts
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based image capture/sharing environment, with paper-based activities also possible.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately represent core concepts of scientific texts in hierarchical structure diagrams with over 80% accuracy
Learners can explain at least three relationships between concepts using self-generated graphic organizers (achieving 60% in formative assessment criteria)
Learners can revise organizers at least twice reflecting peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
